titles.title: I'm happy, I'm healthy, I'm blessed, I'm anointed,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm happy, I'm healthy, I'm blessed, I'm anointed,
I'm filled with power of God.
I'm happy, I'm healthy, I'm blessed, I'm anointed,
I'm filled with the power of God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, hallelujah, I'm filled with the power of God.
Hallelujah, hallelujah, I'm filled with the power of God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I get joy when I think about what He's done for me,
I get joy when I think about how He's set me free.
